title: Fan art - Arcade Riven
body:
This is a fan art by me. And I love this skin. <3
{{champion:92}}

replies.body:
Nicely done! ^-^ 

Do you dabble with color at all? I'd love to see a colored version of this!

Thank you very much! ^-^

Yes gladly, I'll try it this weekend. :)
I'm done. I've posted it, but do not know if you will like it, because I have painted for the first time one of my pictures. :O

This is your *first* time with color? Holy crap - this is really nice! I love the texture on her shorts!
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Hi Katey T.T, can you please check the item I've made? I have made the art (icon) for it myself

can you see my custom item? **I've made an icon for it!**
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/buOIBEzA-the-phoenixs-talon-icon-made-by-me-3

http://www.hiveworkshop.com/forums/pastebin_data/qd31zm/ThePhoenixTalon.jpg

make the other version, the one where she's riding the thing in the client. that's way better than the actual splash, don't know why riot didn't use that version

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/MrveysN462I/maxresdefault.jpg
